title: Body found at Plainville High School; police investigating
content: PLAINVILLE --  Police are investigating a body that was found at the Plainville High School Saturday.  Police said they responded to the scene around 1:15 p.m. and have since cleared the scene.  There is no word where the body was found on school grounds. No identity or the cause of the death has been released at this time.  This is a developing story.
